Honoring the Beatles is , at the same time , a difficult and necessary. To do this in a more relaxed manner and without a lot of responsibility , the musical producer and researcher Marcelo Froes has met with many national artists and bands of different styles and origins - anonymous and famous - for their own versions of what the quartet has produced in recent years of activity.

After the first volume, the second album "Beatles '70" reports the production that marked the end of the Beatles, with songs of the early members struggling with their solo albums. Here are the highlights with "Instant Karma" by LobÃƒÂ£o, "Mother" by Zeca Baleiro and "Beware Of darkenss" ZÃƒÂ© Ramalho. Another song that deserves to be mentioned is definitely the version of "Isolation", offered by the brilliant Twiggy.

The disc is not only for fans and should appeal even to those who do not know so thoroughly the work of " lads from Liverpool ." After all , the tracks left us by the Beatles have become classics and it is very interesting to hear these different Brazilian artists sing this tribute .
